title: Cross-Border E-Commerce English Communication Intensive Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English Reading and Writing Skills, and Understanding of E-Commerce Fundamentals
context.additional_context: Recreating real-world global sales scenarios in a VR environment for synchronous/asynchronous interactive learning. Supporting project-based team formation and BYOD environments

learning_goals: Learners can complete practical dialogue scenarios using 50 cross-border e-commerce terms in VR simulations with ≥80% accuracy.
Learners can collaboratively write three cross-border trade-related English emails/chat communications with teammates using synchronous/asynchronous online tools.
Learners can achieve ≥4.0/5.0 interaction efficiency in global customer service scenarios through simulation assessment systems.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
